title: [Ta'Illistim, Ellaerin Var]
description: Near the southwest end of the var, a round belltower stands tall above the rooftops, considerably higher than the massive city wall.  Blue fire glints from the tower's lapis-tiled spiral cap.
Near the southwest end of the var, a round belltower stands tall above the rooftops, considerably higher than the massive city wall.  Pale moonlight glints from the tower's lapis-tiled spiral cap.
